channel.title: Making basic assault
channel.description:
Hello I need some help for making my assault minigame.
Idk how to make some something random that u need to pay something in a shop. Like here assault points.
Secondly I dont know how to let the npc's give you the assault points when you killed them.
Thirdly, I do use PI as base. Plz help me!!!
Fourtly, How i let the assault points save in characters??
Btw: Sorry for posting in wrong section.
